title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 81 - Subsidiaries Of Insurance Companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 81 - Subsidiaries Of Insurance Companies

State Regulations

Subpart 81-1 - Subsidiaries Of Insurance Companies Subject To The Provisions Of Section 1403(c) Of The Insurance Law (§ 81-1.0 to 81-1.3)

Subpart 81-2 - Subsidiaries Of Life Insurance Companies, Retirement Systems And Article 43 Corporations (§ 81-2.1 to 81-2.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 81

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 307, 308; arts. 16, 17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
